author: jgm
content: Any thoughts on explicit declaration of all keys?  For example, if a block has no proposer slashings can it get away with not sending a `proposer_slashings` key, or _must_ it send `"proposer_slashings":[]`?

author: jgm
content: I'm inclined to say the latter _i.e._ we should fully specify all data being sent.

author: djrtwo
content: I tend to agree. Explicit better than implicit seems better when mapping ssz types to js, imo
